Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/platform/api/v1/agent_bots/{id} \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "name": "My Agent Bot",
  "description": "This is a sample agent bot",
  "outgoing_url": "https://example.com/webhook",
  "account_id": 1,
  "avatar_url": "https://example.com/avatar.png"
}'
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by the system admin after creating a platformApp. This token should be used to provision agent bots, accounts, users and their roles.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#parameter-id)

id

integer

required

The ID of the agentbot to be updated

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#body-name)

name

string

The name of the agent bot

Example:

`"My Agent Bot"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#body-description)

description

string

The description of the agent bot

Example:

`"This is a sample agent bot"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#body-outgoing-url)

outgoing\_url

string

The webhook URL for the bot

Example:

`"https://example.com/webhook"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#body-account-id)

account\_id

integer

The account ID to associate the agent bot with

Example:

`1`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#body-avatar)

avatar

file

Send the form data with the avatar image binary or use the avatar\_url

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#body-avatar-url)

avatar\_url

string

The url to a jpeg, png file for the agent bot avatar

Example:

`"https://example.com/avatar.png"`

#### Response

200

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-id)

id

number

ID of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-name)

name

string

The name of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-description)

description

string

The description about the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-thumbnail)

thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the agent bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-outgoing-url)

outgoing\_url

string

The webhook URL for the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-bot-type)

bot\_type

string

The type of the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-bot-config)

bot\_config

object

The configuration of the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-account-id)

account\_id

number

Account ID if it's an account specific bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-access-token)

access\_token

string

The access token for the bot

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/agentbots/update-an-agent-bot#response-system-bot)

system\_bot

boolean

Whether the bot is a system bot
